name: Untuned Heart
description:
From collection "inside: Lost things"

Portrait of Jalil Shahnaz (1921 – 2013) one of the greatest maestros of Persian classical music and a virtuoso of the tar 


Your instrument song is still heard in the alley
In the city
And in the café
In me
Tune your instrument
Let your fingers caress the strings
This instrument misses you
And city and cafe
And I
The sound of your instrument rings in my ear
In my heart
Strings of my heart miss your kind fingers
My heart is silent without you
Your instrument song 
Breaks its cold and hard silence
The sound of your instrument
Is still in the house of my heart
In the city
And in the café
Everywhere
always
Is heard
I still do not believe
That you are gone
And you left your instrument behind: my heart
